item.title: Roadmap to becoming a CNCF mentee
item.description: Let’s first start with what is CNCF Cloud Native Computing Foundation is a collection of technologies and practices that automate the deployment and management of highly decoupled and resilient application workloads across elastic infrastructures using a uniform abstraction of computing resources. - Vladimir Vivien CNCF mentorships programs Google Summer of Code (GSoC) Google Season of Docs (GSoD) LFX Mentorship (formerly community bridge) Outreachy Understand the CNCF landscape
